text: (Napiyē!) Ivarkaḷ pūmiyil cuṟṟit tiriyavillaiyā? (Tirintiruntāl) ivarkaḷukku muṉṉiruntavarkaḷiṉ muṭivu evvāṟu āyiṟṟu eṉpataik kaṇṭukoḷvārkaḷ. (Muṉṉirunta) avarkaḷō, palattālum, pūmiyil viṭṭuc ceṉṟa (pūrva) ciṉṉaṅkaḷālum ivarkaḷaiviṭa mikaittavarkaḷākavē iruntaṉar. (Eṉiṉum,) avarkaḷiṉ pāvaṅkaḷiṉ kāraṇamāka avarkaḷai allāh piṭittuk koṇṭāṉ. Allāhviṉ piṭiyiliruntu avarkaḷai pātukāttuk koḷḷa oruvarum irukkavillai
